result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Tommy Thorn Bush

records.addlTxt: Objection to Other Acts Evidence, Filed.
Defendant's Response Motion to the DA - Paul Tiffin's Motion to Admit Evidence.  (Tommy T. Bush - #2022002590, Milwaukee County Jail, 949 N 9th St, Milwaukee WI 53233).
Letter from defendant re:  firing Attorney Michael Plaisted - Self Representation.  (Tommy T. Bush - #2022002590, Milwaukee County Jail, 949 N 9th St, Milwaukee WI 53233).
state's motion to admit other acts evid with attachments.pdf, Filed.

Defendant's Motion to Reconsider Frank-Mann Hearing & Dismiss, Motion to Suppress Identification & Motion Alleging Misconduct of District Attorney.  (Tommy T. Bush - #2022002590, Milwaukee County Jail, 949 N 9th St, Milwaukee WI 53233).

Defendant's Motion for Reconsideration of Frank-Mann Hearing, Motion to Suppress Identification, Motion to Have ADA Paul Tiffin Removed from Case, Demand for Discovery.  (Tommy Thorn Bush - #2022002590, Milwaukee County Jail, 949 N 9th St, Milwaukee WI 53233).
Letter from defendant re:  Extra Time for Hearing.  (Tommy T. Bush - #2022002590, Milwaukee County Jail, 949 N 9th St, Milwaukee WI 53233).
Proposed- Order Appointing Counsel (Atty Plaisted, counsel of record 9/16/22)

Defendant Tommy Thorn Bush in court, in custody.  Attorney Michael B Plaisted in court for Tommy Thorn Bush.  Assistant District Attorney Paul Leonard Tiffin in court for State of Wisconsin.   For reasons as stated on the record, the Court DENIED the Identification motion.  

SPEEDY TRIAL DEMAND requested by defense.  
Case is adjourned for final pre trial and jury trial.  The Court advised parties to file any pretrial documents 48 hours in advance of the final pre trial.  Case remains calendared in Br 45.  mn
Final pre-trial scheduled for November 9, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Jury trial scheduled for November 28, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Tommy Thorn Bush in court, in custody.  Attorney Michael B Plaisted in court as standby counsel for Tommy Thorn Bush.  Attorney Paul Leonard Tiffin in court for State of Wisconsin. Case in court in response to defendant's motions: Franks-Mann, motion to disqualify prosecutor, and motion to suppress identification. Arguments heard. Court finds defendant has not met burden for Franks-Mann. Motion for Franks-Mann hearing and motion to dismiss denied by the court as set forth in the record. Court finds no deliberate falsification to quantify as prosecutorial misconduct. Motion to disqualify prosecutor denied by the court as set forth in the record. Court held colloquy with the defendant regarding representation of defendant by Atty Plaisted. Defendant requests Atty Plaisted to be appointed as counsel for the defendant. Court grants request and appoints Atty Plaisted as counsel for the defendant.
Letter from defendant re:  Amended Motion to Suppress Identification and Amended Frank-Mann Motion.  (Tommy T. Bush - #2022002590, Milwaukee County Jail, 949 N 9th St, Milwaukee WI 53233).
Letter from defendant re:  Amending Frank-Mann Hearing Motion.  (Tommy T. Bush - #2022002590, Milwaukee County Jail, 949 N 9th St, Milwaukee WI 53233).
Letter from defendant re:  Amended Complaint: Misconduct in Public Office of DA Paull Tiffin.  (Tommy T. Bush, Jr. - #2022002590, Milwaukee County Jail, 949 N 9th St, Milwaukee WI 53233).
Received and filed.

Defendant Tommy Thorn Bush in court, in custody.  Attorney Michael B Plaisted in court as standby counsel for Tommy Thorn Bush.  Attorney Paul Leonard Tiffin in court for State of Wisconsin. 

Case in court for a scheduling conference.  Court found the State has satisfied victims' rights law.  Bail motion by defendant argued and denied by the Court.  Defendant requests a private investigator.  Court advises Attorney Plaisted to submit an Order and Court will sign Order to appoint a private investigator at county expense.  Court allows defendant to review video evidence in the jail.  Defendant requests all photos and body cam videos. Court scheduled a motion hearing to address Franks-Mann motion, identification motion, and motion to disqualify prosecutor.  Case adjourned to Branch 45, Rm G55A CJF.
Motion hearing scheduled for September 16, 2022 at 09:00 am.
State's reponse to pretrial motions, with attachments.pdf, Filed.
Notice of Appearance, Filed.

Defendant Tommy Thorn Bush in court with attorney Melissa Nepomiachi, who appeared via zoom.  Defendant Tommy Thorn Bush in custody.  Paul Leonard Tiffin appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Due to breakdown in communication, the defendant is requesting attorney Nepomiachi  withdraw as counsel of record.  Statements made,  Court Granted defendants request.  
Defendant advised the Court he would appear pro se.   The Court conducts colloquy with defendant regarding his right to appear pro se.  The State finds the defendant is competent to proceed without counsel.  After extensive colloquy the Court finds the defendant freely, knowingly and with understanding elects to continue pro se.  The defendant completed and signed Waiver of Right To Attorney.  The Court advised defendant she will appoint Attorney Michael Plaisted as Stand by Counsel at the rate of $100.00 per hour.   Order Appointing Stand By Counsel, signed by the Court.  
Court ordered the balance of digital discovery transmitted to defendant by the State.  This matter is adjourned for scheduling and to address bail at the next hearing.  mn  Scheduling conference scheduled for August 30, 2022 at 09:30 am.

Defendant's Motion to Suppress Identification
Defendant's Motion for A Frank/Mann Hearing and to Dismiss, recieved and filed.   mn
Letter from defendant re:  Misconduct in Office of District Attorney Paul Tiffin.  (Tommy T. Bush - #2022002590, Milwaukee County Jail, 949 N 9th St, Milwaukee WI 53233).
Defendant's Third Motion to Modify Bail.  (Tommy T. Bush - #2022002590, Milwaukee County Jail, 949 N 9th St, Milwaukee WI 53233).
Letter from defendant re:  self-representation.  (Tommy T. Bush - #2022002590, Milwaukee County Jail, 949 N 9th St, Milwaukee WI 53233).

Defendant Tommy Thorn Bush in court with attorney Melissa Nepomiachi.  Defendant Tommy Thorn Bush in custody.  Paul Leonard Tiffin appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case in court for a bail/bond hearing. State is opposed to bail modification.   Bail motion by defense argued and denied by the Court. Court adjourns matter for a status conference.  All parties are notified that effective July 30, 2022, this case will be assigned to Judge Jean Kies, Br 45, room 502 SB  Status conference scheduled for August 9, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendant's Second Motion to Modify Bail, filed.
on defense request, via email confirmation, 7.19 rescheduled to July 14, 2022, 10am.  kmw

Defendant Tommy Thorn Bush in court with attorney Melissa Nepomiachi.  Defendant Tommy Thorn Bush in custody.  Paul Leonard Tiffin appeared for the State of Wisconsin. via Zoom.   The court does not find a legal basis for new counsel.  Motion to withdraw taken under advisement.  Court will hear arguments as to pro se representation on adjourn date.  Bail/bond hearing scheduled for July 19, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
All parties are notified that effective July 30, 2022, this case will be assigned to Judge Jean Kies, Br 45, room 502 SB

Defendant Tommy Thorn Bush in court with attorney Melissa Nepomiachi.  Defendant Tommy Thorn Bush in custody, CJF.  Ian F Vance-Curzan for Paul Tiffin appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Tommy Thorn Bush appeared by video means with Attorney.  Based on defendant remarks, court sets for in-person status.  Status conference scheduled for July 6, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Received and Filed: Motion for Demand & Discovery from Defendant.

Attorney Melissa Nepomiachi in court, defendant Tommy Thorn Bush not in court, in custody.  Paul Leonard Tiffin unavailable.  Adjourned for status to select trial dates.  Status conference scheduled for June 30, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Melissa Nepomiachi in court, defendant Tommy Thorn Bush not in court, in custody, CJF.  Paul Leonard Tiffin appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defense awaiting additional discovery.  Status conference scheduled for June 14, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant's Motion for Reconsideration of Bail Modification.  (Tommy T. Bush - #2022002590, Milwaukee County Jail, 949 N 9th St, Milwaukee WI 53233).
Letter from defendant addressing Attorney Melissa Nepomiachi.  (Tommy T. Bush - #2022002590, Milwaukee County Jail, 949 N 9th St, Milwaukee WI 53233).

Defendant Tommy Thorn Bush in court with attorney Melissa Nepomiachi.  Defendant Tommy Thorn Bush in custody.  Paul Leonard Tiffin appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defense bail motion argued and denied.  Scheduling conference scheduled for April 25, 2022 at 09:30 am.

Defendant Tommy Thorn Bush in court with Attorney Melissa Nepomiachi; both appear by video.  Defendant Tommy Thorn Bush in custody.  Paul Tiffin appeared in person for the State of Wisconsin.  
Preliminary hearing proceeded.  Sworn for the State: MPD Detectives T. Schimmels & M. Saavedra. Exhibit #1 offered by the State and received by the Court. State rests.  Defense rests.  Defense motion to dismiss argued and denied. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Original information received and filed;  defendant given a copy, waived reading, was arraigned in open court and plead not guilty. States withdraws exhibit #1. Defense to be heard on bail on the next date. Next date is provided by the clerk in Br. 34.  Case is adjourned to Branch 34.  Bail/bond hearing scheduled for March 18, 2022 at 09:30 am.

Court ordered no contact with Giordano CD; Luis CS
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for Level 5 Supervision with Electronic Monitoring; No Contact Order.    If electronic monitoring device is unavailable and cash bail has been paid, Defendant to be released and placed on the waiting list.  Defendant to be monitored by drug testing.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Tommy Thorn Bush in court with attorney Travis Schwantes.  Defendant Tommy Thorn Bush in custody.  Anna Marie Meulbroek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Tommy Thorn Bush appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Yamahiro, Branch 34.  Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  Commissioner advised DNA sample has been obtained from the Defendant.  Court advised Defendant he/she may qualify to have the DNA sample data expunged if he meets the conditions under Wisconsin Statutes Section 165.77(4).  This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for March 10, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
